name: Firecracker Salmon with Spicy Molasses
author: Chef Mo
summary: Baked salmon made with a quick blended marinade delivering the deep rich flavor of molasses and the undertones of some spice.
directions: Combine cilantro, molasses, relish, garlic, olive oil, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in a blender and blend until smooth
Place salmon in a shallow glass baking dish and coat with the molasses mixture
Turn salmon over and refrigerate 15 minutes more
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Uncover baking dish and turn salmon skin-side down in the baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until fish flakes easily with a fork and the internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), about 20 minutes
